prompt: Centered portrait of a professional middle-aged man in a business suit, standing confidently in a spacious, well-appointed CEO office with elegant furnishings and tasteful decor. Warm, natural lighting, subtle depth of field, and a refined, welcoming atmosphere. Variation in pose, facial expression, and office details for each image.

Centered portrait of a professional woman in business attire, in a bright, modern office setting with large windows, contemporary furniture, and greenery. Soft, balanced lighting, clean lines, and a professional yet approachable vibe. Variation in her posture, expression, and background elements for each image.

Centered portrait of a mature business executive man in smart attire, set against an active logistics warehouse background with shelves, boxes, and workers in the distance. Natural lighting, realistic workplace details, and a sense of industrious energy. Variation in his pose, expression, and background activity for each image.

Centered portrait of a professional woman CTO in business attire, in an open-plan tech company office with collaborative workspaces, plants, and colleagues working in the background. Bright, airy lighting, modern furnishings, and a dynamic, inclusive atmosphere. Variation in her stance, facial expression, and office layout for each image.

Centered portrait of a senior male executive in sharp business attire, in a sophisticated financial office environment with large windows, city views, and minimalist yet elegant decor. Soft natural lighting, professional ambiance, and subtle variation in pose, expression, and office details for each image.
